definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Job 36:32; Je 13:16) light (As. urru = ûru Dl:w).—abs. Ge 1:3 +; cstr. Ju Jdg 16:2 +; sf. [[אוֹרִי]] Ps 27:1, etc.; pl. [[אוֹרִים]] Ps 136:7; —
light as diffused in nature, light of day Ge 1:3, Ge 1:4, Ge 1:5 (P) Job 3:9, Job 38:19 +.

morning light, dawn, [[אוֹר הַבּׂקֶר]] light of the morn. Ju Jdg 16:2, 1Sa 14:36, 1Sa 25:34, 1Sa 25:36, 2Sa 17:22, 2Ki 7:9, Mic 2:1; [[בּׂקֶר]] ´[[א]] 2Sa 23:4 (poem of David); ´[[עַד־הָא]] Ju Jdg 19:26 (cf. [[עַד־הַבּׂקֶר]] v:Jdg 19:25); [[לָאוֹר]] Job 24:14; [[מִן־הָאוֹר עַד מַחֲחִית הַיּוֹם]] fr. dawn till mid-day, Ne 8:3 cf. Pr 4:18.

light of the heavenly luminaries; [[הַלְּבָנׇה]] ´[[א]], ‖[[הַחַמָּה]] ´[[א]] moonlight & sunlight Is 30:26; [[כּוֹכְבֵי אוֹר ]] stars of light Ps 148:3; [[מְאוֹרֵי אוֹר]] luminaries of light Ez Eze 32:8; [[אוֹרִים]] = [[מְאוֹרִים]] Ps 136:7; so [[עֲלֵי־אוֹר]] in sunshine Is 18:4; the sun itself Job 31:26.
daylight [[אוֹר רְשָׁעִים]] light of the wicked Job 38:15 (their work-day being the night); [[יוֹם אוֹר]] a day of light Am 8:9 (= a clear, sunshiny day).
lightning Job 36:32, Job 37:3, Job 37:11, Job 37:15 cf. Hb Hab 3:11.
light of lamp Pr 13:9, Je 25:10; of crocodile's hot breath Job 41:10.
light of life [[חַיִּים]] ´[[א]] Job 33:30, Ps 56:14; cf. [[אוֹר]] Job 3:16, Job 3:20.
light of prosperity Job 22:28, Job 30:26, Ps 97:11, La 3:2.

light of instruction [[נֵר מִחְוׇה וְתוֹרָה אוֹר]] Pr 6:23 the commandment is a lamp and instruction a light; so the Messian. servant is [[אוֹר גּוֹיִם]] Is 42:6, Is 49:6; cf. [[עַמִּים]] ´[[א]] Is 51:4; the advent of Mess. is shining of great light Is 9:1, Is 9:1.

light of face [[אוֹר פָּנִים]] = bright, cheerful face (of men) Job 29:24; betokening king's favour Pr 16:15 (cf. [[עֵינַיִם]] ´[[א]] Ps 38:11); of God = his shining, enlightening, favouring face Ps 4:7, Ps 44:4, Ps 89:16.

Yahweh is [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] ´[[א]] Is 10:17, as source enlightenment & prosperity; light & salvation Ps 27:1; light to guide Mic 7:8 cf. Ps 43:3; everlasting light of Zion, instead of sun & moon Is 60:19, Is 60:20; house of Jacob is to walk in his light Is 2:5.
